name: BootOps
body:
### Welcome to BootOps.
This is a project to help you bootstrap your Ops environment. You get:

* Configuration Management (Puppet)
* Monitoring (Sensu)
* Central Logging (Logstash)
* Backup (Blueback)

### Coming Soon!

Created by Anton Cohen (@antoncohen)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
